title: Gummy Candy
directions: In a saucepan, stir together the sugar free gelatin, unflavored gelatin and water until it resembles dough. Warm over medium heat until melted. Pour into molds, or onto a baking tray. Refrigerate or freeze until firm, about 10 minutes in the freezer. Unmold or cut with cookie cutters and serve.
ingredients: 1 (.6 ounce) package sugar-free fruit flavored gelatin mix
